#summary ChangeLog v1.2
#labels ChangeLog


== Changes for 1.2 (2007-06-10) ==

* Wizard for Visual C++ 6.0

	# Enable/Disable warning of directory tree.
	# L10n: support non-english language resources.
	# Change wizard icon.
	# Support modeless dialog.
	# Bugfix - uninitial variable: CComModule `_`Module.

* Tutorials

	# Modeless Dialog Application: [http://winxsamp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/winxsamp/tutorials/winx/step022-modeless/ tutorials/winx/step022-modeless]

* WINX-Core

	# MessageFilter
		* property: [WINX_MSGFILTER], [WINX_MSGFILTER WINX_MSGFILTER_NULL]
		* function: RunMsgLoop
		* class: MessageHook, [MessageHook AutoMessageHook] (remove SimpleHook)
		* class: MessageFilter
		* class ModelessDialog support MessageFilter in default
	# MainFrame
		* ModalDialog -> ModelDialog
		* ModalessDialog -> ModelessDialog
		* class: MainDlgFrame, [MainDlgFrame AxMainDlgFrame]
		* property: [WINX_MAINFRAME]
		* message: OnMainFrameTerm
	# Modeless support (function: RunMsgLoop)
	# [WINX_DLG_ACCEL] -> [WINX_ACCELFRAME]
	# Accel bugfix: Menu can't receive its keyboard messages after hooking.

* STL-Extension

	# Remove STD`_`DELETE macro. Use alloc.destroy(obj), instead of STD`_`DELETE(alloc, obj).
